author: Ifan Kloezeman
comment: This is by far one of my favorite watchfaces. Works great on my LG G Watch paired with my Nexus 5 zero bugs. Love the font and how the stop play button turns black when listening to Google Music. Rated 4 stars. Features i'd like to see: Ability to set 24h or 12h AM/PM format, display the date, Toggle ambient mode to color or black or white. This would make it perfect. Would rate 5 stars or even pay for this. Way better than most paid watchfaces. The Japanese know how its done.
title: Great Design

author: Ted Miller
comment: An instant favorite. Needs ambient mode and 12/24 hour opt. Don't know if phone app is a bonus.
title: Love the font
